tjc.model.agent

Class AgentStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • tjc.model.agent.AgentStats

  • public class AgentStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the total and per tick values for CO2, electricity and money

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgentStats()
      Constructor sets all stored per tick values to zero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Sets the total amount of money to a specific value

      Returns the current ticks' values as a string in csv format in the order electricity, carbon, money

      Updates the stored carbon dioxide information per tick and in total

      Updates the electricity per tick and in total.

      • AgentStats

        public AgentStats()
        Constructor sets all stored per tick values to zero

    • Method Detail

      • updateElectricity

        public void updateElectricity(float value,
                              int tick)
        Updates the electricity per tick and in total. If this is the first time this has been called for a given tick, it resets the other per tick values to zero
        Parameters:
        value - The amount of electricity to add
        tick - The current tick

      • updateCarbon

        public void updateCarbon(float value)
        Updates the stored carbon dioxide information per tick and in total
        Parameters:
        value - The amount of CO2 to add

      • updateMoney

        public void updateMoney(float value)
        Updates the total and per tick amounts of money
        Parameters:
        value - The amount of money to add

      • setMoneyTot

        public void setMoneyTot(float moneyTot)
        Sets the total amount of money to a specific value
        Parameters:
        moneyTot - The amount of money to be set
